Name: The Hidden Treasure of the Black Shores
Description: After following the clues, you discover the room said to conceal hidden treasures. Yet, it appears to be just an ordinary room…
QuestDesc: After following the clues, you discover the room said to conceal hidden treasures. Yet, it appears to be just an ordinary room…

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On the desk, the terminal's screen is still lit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You look at the information displayed—seems to be a voice-to-text memo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It appears to be a record of conversation that once took place here. Unfortunately, the original audio file is corrupted.
